SEARCH
Package pamViewFX.fxNodes.flipPane

Class PamFlipPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
pamViewFX.fxNodes.flipPane.FlipPane
pamViewFX.fxNodes.flipPane.PamFlipPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class PamFlipPane extends FlipPane
Flip pane which has is supposed to be used for advanced settings. The front of the pane is to be used for standard settings and the pane can then flip to the back to show advanced settings. A back button is included in the back pane which can be used to flip the pane back to the standard settings. The front pane needs a control that calls flipPane.toBack() to show the advanced pane.
Author:
Jamie Macaulay
